column2: "Mebɛda EWURADZE ase mber nyinara: N'ayɛyi nnkefi m'anomu da."
"Me kra hyehyɛ noho wɔ EWURADZE mu: Abrɛfo no bɛtse nka na hɔn enyi agye."
"Hom nye me ntonton EWURADZE ne kɛseyɛ
column3: Na hom mma yɛmbɔ mu nhuhor ne dzin."

column2: "Musui frɛɛ EWURADZE
column4: Na oyii me fii mo suro nyinara mu."

column2: "Abrɛfo hwɛ no
column3: na oenya akomatɔmu: Na hɔn enyim runngu ase da."

column2: "Ɔbɔbɔnyi yi tsea mu
column4: Na ɔgye no fi no fona nyinara mu."

column2: "EWURADZE no bɔfoe no kyer hɔn a wosuro no ho nsera hyia
"Ao
column3: hom nsɔ nhwɛ na hom nhu dɛ EWURADZE ye: Osiarfo nye nyimpa a no werɛ hyɛ no mu."

column2: "Hom n'ahotseweefo
column3: hom nsuro EWURADZE: Na biribi rinnhia hɔn a wosuro no no."

column2: "Ngyataburwa mpo dzi hia
column3: na ɔkɔm dze hɔn: Naaso hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE dze
column4: adze pa biara rinnhia hɔn da."

column2: "Mba
column4: hom nyɛ aso mma me; Mebɛkyerɛ hom EWURADZE no suro."

column2: "Nyimpa mmuana na ɔrohwehwɛ nkwa
"Nna kora wo tɛkyerɛma wɔ bɔn ho
"Yi bɔn akwa
"EWURADZE n'enyiwa wɔ atseneneefo do. Na n'aso wɔ hɔn sufrɛ do."
"EWURADZE enyi sa hɔn a wɔyɛ bɔn
column3: Dɛ obotu hɔn ase korakora efi asaase do."

column2: "Atseneneefo sui frɛe
column4: Na ɔgyee hɔn fii hɔn fona nyinara mu."

column2: "EWURADZE bɛn hɔn a hɔn akoma abobɔ
column3: Na ɔgye hɔn a hɔn sunsum abotow nkwa."

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi n'ahohia dɔɔ so: Naaso EWURADZE yi no fi ne nyinara mu."
"Ɔkora ne mbiew nyinara: Na hɔn mu kor ara mpo mmbu."
"Bɔn boku ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi: Na hɔn a wɔtan tseneneenyi no wobobu hɔn fɔ."
"EWURADZE pon no nkowaa hɔn akra: Na hɔn a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛ no mu no mu biara dze worummbu hɔn fɔ."
